ygData.subject: Re: Alternate Planes Location **SPOILER**
ygData.msgSnippet: Word has it that deep in Feerot, Spectres gaurd the entrance to one of these unknown planes.  I heard this from a beta guy.  If you find exactly where send a
ygData.messageBody:
Word has it that deep in Feerot, Spectres gaurd the entrance to one of these
unknown planes. I heard this from a beta guy. If you find exactly where send
a mail. Maybe we can newbie rush it and get someone in for a screen shot.

Gone till monday
Malkin



Chris Trubiani wrote:

> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>
> I don't know if anyone has been yet, or if they are even implemented yet.
> But I do know that wizard spells are not the only way to get there. There
> are portals located in places around the world that will bring you to
> different planes (or so I have read). They are always guarding by
> exceptionally high creatures though, and wizards would almost always be able
> to get to those planes (because of their spells) before others would be high
> enough to kill the creatures garding the portals.
>
> Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>
